question: 1. What is the purpose of views in structuring an architectural description?
options: d) To focus on one specific aspect only
a) To describe multiple aspects of the system
b) To define the system's functionality
c) To deploy the system
correct_answer: d) To focus on one specific aspect only

question: 2. How is the relationship between view and viewpoint similar to that of object and class?
options: c) They both describe the overall system functionality
d) They serve different purposes in software architecture
b) They both focus on a specific aspect of a system

correct_answer: c) They both describe the overall system functionality
